name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: X-Shield - X盾/推盾/X广告屏蔽/推特广告屏蔽/Twitter广告屏蔽

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block X's ads, intercept phishing and fraud information in X.屏蔽X的广告、拦截X中的钓鱼信息和诈骗信息。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
X-Shield
is a browser plugin that can precisely block phishing and scam messages on Twitter. This plugin flawlessly filters out any attempt to steal cryptocurrency through promotions and scams, whether it's Twitter 'ads,' 'recommendations,' or malicious phishing links in web3 project comment sections. X Shield blocks them all with pinpoint accuracy, protecting you from phishing attacks, scams, ads, malicious content, and abusive information, ensuring the security of your web3 assets.

X盾
是一款可以精准屏蔽推特钓鱼信息、诈骗信息的浏览器插件，这个浏览器插件能完美屏蔽所有试图通过推广和诈骗手法盗取加密货币的信息，不管是推特“广告”、“推荐”，还是web3项目方评论区中的恶意钓鱼链接，本插件都能能精准屏蔽，让你免受钓鱼攻击、诈骗信息、广告信息、恶意信息、滥用信息的困扰，保护你的web3资产安全。
